- Abbiamo migliorato l’utilizzabilità e il disegno dell’app
- Se ti sei iscritto a Supervolotea, potrai accedere ai prezzi con sconto. Non dimenticarti di effettuare il login con il tuo nome utente
- Scansiona la tua carta di credito nella pagina dei pagamenti e conservala per future prenotazioni
- Utilizza i codici promozionali direttamente nell’app
- Abbiamo migliorato le notifiche automatiche

- Abbiamo migliorato l’utilizzabilità e il disegno dell’app
- Se ti sei iscritto a Supervolotea, potrai accedere ai prezzi con sconto. Non dimenticarti di effettuare il login con il tuo nome utente
- Scansiona la tua carta di credito nella pagina dei pagamenti e conservala per future prenotazioni
- Utilizza i codici promozionali direttamente nell’app
- Abbiamo migliorato le notifiche automatiche

Abbiamo aggiornato la nostra app! L’abbiamo perfezionata perché tu possa godere al massimo di tutte le sue funzionalità.

Non dimenticare di lasciare un commento nell’App Store per condividere la tua esperienza con gli altri utenti. Ricorda che teniamo sempre in considerazione la tua opinione per continuare a migliorare la nostra app.

You've been updated! We’ve noticed a few issues happened and we found a fix so you can now have the best experience when using the app.

Be sure to add your comments in the App Store, so you can share your experience with other users. We'll also take a peek at your comments to keep making the app even better!

Welcome to Volotea 3.2, our brand new app!

We have been very busy updating the look and feel of our app, and now we are proud to announce we have a smarter interface, clearer controls and many visual tweaks to improve notifications through our app. Those new visual aids aim to ease your navigation and make your booking process faster and easier. We hope you enjoy them!

**Important Note**: if you had installed previous 2.x version of our app, upon update to this version you may experience screen size issues, not seeing the full height of the app screen. While we find a fix for this issue, please try uninstalling and installing again the app via the App Store or you can even restart your iPhone to solve it.
3.2 version

Welcome to Volotea 3.2, our brand new app!

We have been very busy updating the look and feel of our app, and now we are proud to announce we have a smarter interface, clearer controls and many visual tweaks to improve notifications through our app. Those new visual aids aim to ease your navigation and make your booking process faster and easier. We hope you enjoy them!

**Important Note**: if you had installed previous 2.x version of our app, upon update to this version you may experience screen size issues, not seeing the full height of the app screen. While we find a fix for this issue, please try uninstalling and installing again the app via the App Store or you can even restart your iPhone to solve it.

We have been very busy these weeks after launching version 3.0 of our app, we have been trying to fix errors that we have detected and now we can say that we have solved the following:

- Numerous problems disappear when downloading boarding passes.
- We have solved some random errors in the process of changes of the reservation.
- We brought solution to an error in the display of the lower bar in the Combo discount selection screen.
- Improvements in the access to the client profile that avoid problems in the loading of your account information.
- Solution of some errors related to the loading of the list of your trips in the customer profile.
- Improvements in the performance of some internal processes of the application.
- Corrections in some texts that until now have been elusive, but finally we have found translation for them.

And also in this version we have included some news how:

- We have included visual improvements in the calendar and in other elements across the app.
- Haptic response has been added to errors and upon confirmation of key actions.
- We also recently added new filter options in the offers section so you can search by source and destination for the best prices for your next trips.

We hope you enjoy all these news and of course, you can contact us and to send us suggestions to mobile@volotea.com, we will be happy to receive your feedback.

This new version (yet another one) fixes recently detected errors and adds some improvements:

- Improvements in the generation of boarding passes.
- Greater stability in the information load of the Volotea profile.
- We have included visual improvements in the selection of calendar flight dates.

Of course, you can contact us and send us suggestions to mobile@volotea.com, we will be happy to receive your feedback and comments.

We've been very busy testing the app and hearing about your feedback, and we focused this build on bringing more stability and better error handling in many processes across the app. There are a lot of little improvements that will bring a better experience, here's a roundup of some of those updates you can start using today once your app is updated:

- Better error handling, now you will get detailed feedback on the cause of the error, and we add the possiblity to retry in somecases there's been some setback.
- Improvements on login screen that will bring a faster and more stable login/signup.
- Low connectivity detection, and therefore proper error messages about those lousy times with low signal.
- We now have an improved and better error reporting, so we will have more information on any future issues the app logs.
- Also there are some improvements in loading times when you search flights, making use of some pre-loaded resources.
- Reduce most image loading times, majorly by using internal storage when available.

We've been hearing the app and testing your feedback, or the other way around :S, so intense we might mixed things up a little. But anyway, whatever the important thing is we have a new release. This new build improves error handling, and we've solved some bugs related to boarding pass generation. However there's also some new features included that will bring a better experience, you can start using them once your app is updated:

- New Megavolotea feature list popup, more visual than before and better describing subscription advantages.
- Added geolocalization service to setup origin in some forms, like in fligt status search form. Also based on geolocation profile screen background may load different images.
- Possibility to disable haptic feedback through notification settings.
- Added possibility to rate the app... if you like it. And we hope so. Sincerely. Go rate it. Thanks for your support.

We've been hearing the app and testing your feedback, or the other way around :S, so intense we might mixed things up a little. But anyway, whatever the important thing is we have a new release. This new build improves error handling, and we've solved some bugs related to boarding pass generation. However there's also some new features included that will bring a better experience, you can start using them once your app is updated:

- New Megavolotea feature list popup, more visual than before and better describing subscription advantages.
- Added geolocalization service to setup origin in some forms, like in fligt status search form. Also based on geolocation profile screen background may load different images.
- Possibility to disable haptic feedback through notification settings.
- Added possibility to rate the app... if you like it. And we hope so. Sincerely. Go rate it. Thanks for your support.

We focused this build on bringing more stability there are a lot of little improvements that will bring a better experience in many processes, like the origin and destination selection and on the calendar date selection. Moreover, we solved an issue for our french users in the confirmation screen so they can rate our app, Sacrebleu!

We focused this build on bringing more stability there are a lot of little improvements that will bring a better experience in many processes, like the origin and destination selection and on the calendar date selection. Moreover, we solved an issue for our french users in the confirmation screen so they can rate our app, Sacrebleu!

We introduced a totally revamped loading screen. Furthermore, (finally) we managed to solve the issue on not being able to download return flight boarding passes, thanks to all of you who gave us details to spot this naughty bug and put it down. We also have a new feature some of you asked that is related to storing "Volotea friends", your travelmates, the people you travel most with. You need to create an account and store their contact information and you will never have to type it again in the passengers step, just click their initials. Also there are some little visual improvements in the flight status list. We hope you like this update.

We introduced a totally revamped loading screen. Furthermore, (finally) we managed to solve the issue on not being able to download return flight boarding passes, thanks to all of you who gave us details to spot this naughty bug and put it down. We also have a new feature some of you asked that is related to storing "Volotea friends", your travelmates, the people you travel most with. You need to create an account and store their contact information and you will never have to type it again in the passengers step, just click their initials. Also there are some little visual improvements in the flight status list. We hope you like this update.

In Volotea we are committed to offering you a better flight experience, and today we're back for a new product release, we introduce now the priority boarding as an additional service you can add to your booking, want to be first to board and have your hand luggage in the cabin? Don't think twice, remember there are limited units per flight. Priority Boarding will be added to our loyal Megavolotea Plus members without any extra cost. We hope you enjoy it!

In Volotea we are committed to offering you a better flight experience, and today we're back for a new product release, we introduce now the priority boarding as an additional service you can add to your booking, want to be first to board and have your hand luggage in the cabin? Don't think twice, remember there are limited units per flight. Priority Boarding will be added to our loyal Megavolotea Plus members without any extra cost. We hope you enjoy it!

We focused this build on bringing more stability there are a lot of little improvements that will bring a better experience while using the app. We updated some destination images, fixed some wrong labels and fixed some errors regarding login popup, change flight process and flight status.

We focused this build on bringing more stability there are a lot of little improvements that will bring a better experience while using the app. We updated some destination images, fixed some wrong labels and fixed some errors regarding login popup, change flight process and flight status.

We focused this build on two little improvements. We restructured the information displayed in the combo selection screen to make it more clear, we now display the discount in the buttons to select each bundle, so you will realize they are really good value for money!. Moreover, we also updated the way to select the onboard menu, making it easier to select for each passenger, much like the seat selection. We hope you enjoy them!

We focused this build on two little improvements. We restructured the information displayed in the combo selection screen to make it more clear, we now display the discount in the buttons to select each bundle, so you will realize they are really good value for money!. Moreover, we also updated the way to select the onboard menu, making it easier to select for each passenger, much like the seat selection. We hope you enjoy them!

One month closer to the summer, we refreshed our app with a better geolocation feature. Now the app will be more precise as it will take the location data from your device (previous asking kindly for permission) to give a better position for the origin field in the search flights and flight status features. We also introduced some fixes and some tweaks for passbooks with priority boarding. We hope you enjoy them!

One month closer to the summer, we refreshed our app with a better geolocation feature. Now the app will be more precise as it will take the location data from your device (previous asking kindly for permission) to give a better position for the origin field in the search flights and flight status features. We also introduced some fixes and some tweaks for passbooks with priority boarding. We hope you enjoy them!

We recovered in this update a feature we lost, but we found it again and now it's back for good: Universal links and behind this fancy name, it means when you click on certain links the app will show up straight in that feature you're looking for, isn't it good stuff? Also we ask for contact information for all passengers to be informed on flight updates and also there's a new popup with dangerous goods information, important to read it and repeat our mantra: Safety first!

We recovered in this update a feature we lost, but we found it again and now it's back for good: Universal links and behind this fancy name, it means when you click on certain links the app will show up straight in that feature you're looking for, isn't it good stuff? Also we ask for contact information for all passengers to be informed on flight updates and also there's a new popup with dangerous goods information, important to read it and repeat our mantra: Safety first!

This new version (yet another one) fixes recently detected errors and adds some improvements. Of course, you can contact us and send us suggestions to mobile@volotea.com, we will be happy to receive your feedback and comments.

We refresh our app in the summertime with this fresh new update that brings an splash of PayPal support in our payment options, it brings a new wallet id card for all of our Megavolotea members and a brand new Flight Status view with live tracking support using FlightRadar24, how cool is that? Finally we couldn't miss the chance to introduce some fixes for recently detected errors and adds some improvements.

We refresh our app in the summertime with this fresh new update that brings an splash of PayPal support in our payment options, it brings a new wallet id card for all of our Megavolotea members and a brand new Flight Status view with live tracking support using FlightRadar24, how cool is that? Finally we couldn't miss the chance to introduce some fixes for recently detected errors and adds some improvements.

We noticed in our previous update we forgot to include a very requested feature: Travel Documents, so now you can introduce your documents data, store them in your profile and quickly add them in the bookings that may require them in order to check-in. Also we noticed some bugs and developed some little improvements regarding our newest features: PayPal payment method and flight status with live tracking. Have an awesome summer!

We noticed in our previous update we forgot to include a very requested feature: Travel Documents, so now you can introduce your documents data, store them in your profile and quickly add them in the bookings that may require them in order to check-in. Also we noticed some bugs and developed some little improvements regarding our newest features: PayPal payment method and flight status with live tracking. Have an awesome summer!

We are back to school and it's time for a new release to start the classes! In this new release we made some improvements on your profile screen and we brought a better access to the application from the emails on your inbox by improving the use of universal links. We captured some wild bugs on the way, those won't be bothering us any more. We hope you enjoy this new update and remember that you can reach us at mobile@volotea.com.

We are back to school and it's time for a new release to start the classes! In this new release we made some improvements on your profile screen and we brought a better access to the application from the emails on your inbox by improving the use of universal links. We captured some wild bugs on the way, those won't be bothering us any more. We hope you enjoy this new update and remember that you can reach us at mobile@volotea.com.

Back to business as usual, in this new release we corrected an issue with session handling and we prepared for Secure Customer Authentication when it applies. We recommend you update soon and also please remember that you can reach us at mobile@volotea.com.

Back to business as usual, in this new release we corrected an issue with session handling and we prepared for Secure Customer Authentication when it applies. We recommend you update soon and also please remember that you can reach us at mobile@volotea.com.

This is an important release for us, we've been updating frameworks, correcting bugs and as a result now our app runs much faster and it has become much more responsive than ever before. This will allow us to move forward and offer you more new features in future versions. We will appreciate if you contact us in mobile@volotea.com for any bug report or any suggestion, we're all ears!

This will allow us to move forward and offer you more new features in future versions. We will appreciate if you contact us in mobile@volotea.com for any bug report or any suggestion, we're all ears!

A pair of spooky new features to celebrate Halloween: we added a long demanded boarding pass wallet inside the app, it will allow you to store all your upcoming flights boarding passes and also, now you can upgrade to Megavolotea, our advantages membership, easily just from your profile, and say you're already Megavolotea (great choice btw!), well now you will be available to manage your subscription, download your Megawallet and keep track of all your savings during the year, how cool is that?.

We bring an important update with lots of bugfixes, first and foremost we corrected an issue with image caché which might have prevented to open the app properly in the past few days, sorry about that. We recommend you update soon and also please remember that you can reach us at mobile@volotea.com.

We are back with a new release, we're doing some housekeeping, we adjusted a few things, we corrected some bugs we found, improved a little bit the app performance that was not working at full speed and we updated the greek language with a new font, so it's worth to update the app!

We are back with a new release, we're doing some housekeeping, we adjusted a few things, we corrected some bugs we found, improved a little bit the app performance that was not working at full speed and we updated the greek language with a new font, so it's worth to update the app!

Yet another release to start winter season, we included the possibility to confirm Block your price from the app, some bug fixing and a new embedded Volotea cities map, you can now discover new routes from your origin and find the best flight offers right from the app. We recommend you update soon and also please remember that you can reach us at mobile@volotea.com.

Another year, another app release to start the season. It comes with some bugfixing, we have been cleaning up the closet, ordering our priorities, and also, we were making up our mind for the new year's resolutions regarding our app, so you can expect some new features soon. As usual, we recommend you update soon and also please remember that you can reach us at mobile@volotea.com.

Is winter over already? Let's see... but a true fact it's we have another app release for you, this time centered in bugfixing, making it faster and more stable. Remember you can contact us at mobile@volotea.com to suggest new features, or to report any paricular issue.

Having doubts? Second thoughts? Here we come to the rescue! We renewed our in-app FAQ to help you out, find it under the menu, accessing our help section. Let us know your thoughts about it!

Today we add an important feature to our app, from now on, to obtain your boarding passes you have to consent a health declaration and enter contact data for each passenger in your booking. Then you will be able to download and store the boarding passes in the app wallet (accessible by pushing boarding pass button in the main screen) or even in your phone wallet (passbook) so you can self-scan at the boarding gate.

Today we add an important feature to our app, from now on, to obtain your boarding passes you have to consent a health declaration and enter contact data for each passenger in your booking. Then you will be able to download and store the boarding passes in the app wallet (accessible by pushing boarding pass button in the main screen) or even in your phone wallet (passbook) so you can self-scan at the boarding gate.

The course begins again and it is time for updates. This version comes with a new menu loaded with new sections that inform about our services, our fleet and our destinations, update your app now and find out! We have also fixed a problem on the payment page that, in some cases, could close the app while logged in.

Today we bring you an update that resolves an important bug in the loading of the payment page when you are logged in and you have credit available. Okay, that’s fine, and from now on? Well now we continue working to make our app work at its finest and we have a lot of news for the coming months, so… stay tuned!

Halloween's almost here, but fear not we're bringing treats not tricks with this app update. We added (finally) AppleID sign up/sign in support, and with it we recover back Facebook login too. So 2 for the price of... ? No, no, our app comes for free and it will continue being free! Were you frightened with this? Well, pun intended ;)

Halloween's almost here, but fear not we're bringing treats not tricks with this app update. We added (finally) AppleID sign up/sign in support, and with it we recover back Facebook login too. So 2 for the price of... ? No, no, our app comes for free and it will continue being free! Were you frightened with this? Well, pun intended ;)

Let's Go! Today we're introducing a new Combo product in our app to complete our Combo offers trio, we had Combo Basic, Combo Plus and now, Combo Go which includes Priority Boarding, our Flex service and front row seats, so we all can go faster and smarter while traveling, get on board quicker and get your hand luggage with you, seriously go get it when you are booking your next flight!

Let's Go! Today we're introducing a new Combo product in our app to complete our Combo offers trio, we had Combo Basic, Combo Plus and now, Combo Go which includes Priority Boarding, our Flex service and front row seats, so we all can go faster and smarter while traveling, get on board quicker and get your hand luggage with you, seriously go get it when you are booking your next flight!
